scripts.build:gh: npm run clean:gh && cross-env PUBLIC_URL=/wine-guide react-scripts build && shx mv build build-gh
scripts.build:custom: npm run clean:custom && cross-env PUBLIC_URL=/ react-scripts build && shx mv build build-custom
scripts.deploy:origin: npm run build:gh && gh-pages -d build-gh -o origin -b gh-pages
scripts.deploy:origin2: npm run build:custom && gh-pages -d build-custom -o origin2 -b gh-pages -c wine-guide.dvas4155.com
scripts.deploy:both: npm run deploy:origin && npm run deploy:origin2
